body:

title: New vid

replies.body:
Hey I'm not a mod or anything but I don't think the staff will allow links with other servers such as OCN.
Anyways what I usually do if I upload a video that's not on Avicus is usually just put a link to my channel and say "check that latest video out" or something so I don't "advertise" another server.

The rule is somewhat silly in my opinion but that's just what I think.

Anyways, very nice I watched it! :)

replies.body: Put it in Off Topic and I believe it is fine as long as there is no IP in the post Budah :)
